message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $11,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget concerns, but $9,500 is significantly below its value.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,500?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. How about we meet at $9,750? I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.
